events.message: The customer reported a car accident involving a collision with another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under auto accident insurance claims for further processing.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the case involving the vehicle collision claim.
The customer received confirmation that their accident claim was acknowledged and is being processed.
We requested photos of the damaged car, police report, and a copy of the driver’s license to proceed.
The customer submitted all requested documentation including police report and collision photos.
The insurance team began investigating the accident circumstances and insured’s responsibility.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the insured’s vehicle was at fault for the collision.
A settlement offer covering vehicle repairs and medical bills was proposed to the customer.
The customer responded with appreciation for the prompt settlement proposal and clear communication.
The claim was formally approved after agreement on the proposed settlement terms by both parties.
Payment for damages and medical expenses was issued directly to the customer’s account promptly.
The insurance claim was officially closed following the successful payment and customer satisfaction.
